thought: The workflow is fully implemented and tested successfully. The manual trigger starts the workflow, reads news headlines from the specified Google Sheet, classifies each headline using AI, and sends each classification result as a separate message to the Slack channel #news. The output shows successful Slack message sending with correct formatting and content.
plan: Submit the completed task as all requirements are met
The workflow runs successfully without errors
The Slack messages are sent as requested with correct news-category pairs
criticism: No major issues remain; the workflow meets the user requirements completely.

tool_input.result: Workflow implemented and tested successfully. It reads news headlines from Google Sheets, classifies each headline using AI, and sends individual messages to Slack channel #news with the news and category. All steps are verified and working as expected.
